FAQModel.Question: What to do if account is locked, expired or disabled?

Answers.string: Inform the System Administrator that the User ID is either locked, expired or disabled thru email.

FAQModel.Question: What to do if User ID is not enrolled in the system?

Answers.string: Inform the System Administrator that the User ID is not yet enrolled in the system thru email.

FAQModel.Question: How to change value of System Settings?

Answers.string: In Navigation Bar, Click the Settings > System Settings.
In each form, click the Edit Button to edit the values.
Click the Save button.
*System will automatically test if the inputted values are valid or not.
NOTE: Only the ITG Applications and Database Management will access the page.

FAQModel.Question: How to Approve the Pay Code Request?

Answers.string: In navigation bar, click the Home to view all the Pay Code request.
Click the Approve button in the Action column or check the checkbox of the Request then click the Approve button.
NOTE:The E-Channels Supervisor has an access to approve the pending requests.

FAQModel.Question: How to Reject the Pay Code Request?

Answers.string: In navigation bar, click the Home to view all the Pay Code request.
Click the Reject button in the Action column or check the checkbox of the Request then click the Reject button.
NOTE:The E-Channels Supervisor has an access to reject the pending requests.

FAQModel.Question: It is possible to approve and reject more than one request?

Answers.string: Yes
Check the checkbox of the requests then click the approve and reject button.
NOTE:The E-Channels Supervisor has an access to approve and reject the pending requests.

FAQModel.Question: How to Edit the Pay Code request?

Answers.string: In the home page, click the Edit button in the Action column.
In the Edit Request page, edit the fields that need to update.
Click the Save button.
NOTE:The E-Channels Maker has an access to edit requests.

FAQModel.Question: It is possible to Add services in request Pay Code?

Answers.string: Yes.
In the home page, click the Edit button in the Action column.
In the Edit Request page, click the Add button in Services Availed then input the required details for the specific services, then click the Save Button.
Click the Save button.
NOTE:The E-Channels Maker has an access to edit requests.

FAQModel.Question: How to View the details of Pay Code Request?

Answers.string: In navigation bar, click the Home to view all the Pay Code request.
Click the View button beside of the Request description.

FAQModel.Question: How to create Pay Code?

Answers.string: In navigation bar, click the Customer Profile Management > Pay Code Maintenance.
In Pay Code Maintenance page, click the New Pay Code button.
In Create Pay Code page, input the required values.
Click the Save button.
NOTE: The E-Channels - Maker has an access to create Pay Code.

FAQModel.Question: How to edit Pay Code Request?

Answers.string: In Pay Code Maintenance page, click the Edit button in Action column.
In Edit Pay Code page, edit the values that need to be update.
Click Save button.

FAQModel.Question: How to view Pay Code Information?

Answers.string: In Pay Code Maintenance page, click the View button in Action column.

FAQModel.Question: How to view Pay Code Information?

Answers.string: In Pay Code Maintenance page, click the View button in Action column.

FAQModel.Question: How to terminate or delete Pay Code?

Answers.string: In Pay Code Maintenance page, click the Terminate button in Action column.
Confirmation box will apppear, click OK button to request the Pay Code to terminate.

FAQModel.Question: How to Add Relationship Manager?

Answers.string: In Customer Profile Management navigation, click the Relationship Manager Maintenance.
In Relationship Manager page, click the Add Relationship Manager button.
Input the required values.
Click the Save button.

FAQModel.Question: How to Edit Relationship Manager?

Answers.string: In Relationship Manager page, click the Edit button in Action column.
Input the required values that need to update.
Click the Save button.

FAQModel.Question: How to Delete Relationship Manager?

Answers.string: In Relationship Manager page, click the Delete button in Action column.
Confirmation box will appear, then click OK to delete the Relationship Manager.

FAQModel.Question: How to Add a Parameter?

Answers.string: In navigation bar, click the Parameter Maintenance and choose in the catagery of parameter.
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.

FAQModel.Question: How to Add a Branch of CTBC?

Answers.string: In navigation bar, click the Parameter Maintenance > CTBC Branches.
In CTBC Branches page, click the Add Branch button.
In Add Branch page, input a required values.
Click the Save Button.
*System will check if the Branch Code is already exist.
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.

FAQModel.Question: How to Edit a Branch details of CTBC?

Answers.string: In CTBC Branches page, click the Edit Branch button.
In Edit Branch page, input a required values that need to update.
Click the Save Button.
*System will check if the Branch Code is already exist.
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.

FAQModel.Question: How to Activate and Deactivate a Branch of CTBC?

Answers.string: Select Branch to Activate or Deactivate by Ticking the Checkbox beside the Branch Code.
Click the Activate or Deactivate button above the CTBC Branch table.
Click the OK button.
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.

FAQModel.Question: How to Add a Service Type of CTBC?

Answers.string: In navigation bar, click the Parameter Maintenance > Service Types.
In Service Type page, click the Add Service button.
In Add Service page, input a required values.
Click the Save Button.
*System will check if the Service Name is already exist.
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.

FAQModel.Question: How to Edit a Service details?

Answers.string: In Service Type page, click the Edit Services button.
In Edit Services page, input a required values that need to update.
Click the Save Button.
*System will check if the Branch Code is already exist.
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.

FAQModel.Question: How to Activate and Deactivate a Service Type?

Answers.string: Select Service to Activate or Deactivate by Ticking the Checkbox beside the Service ID.
Click the Activate or Deactivate button above the Service Type table.
Click the OK button.
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.

FAQModel.Question: How to Add Investment Type of CTBC?

Answers.string: In navigation bar, click the Parameter Maintenance > Investment Types.
In Investment Type page, click the Add Investment button.
In Add Investment page, input a required values.
Click the Save Button.
*System will check if the Investment Code is already exist.
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.

FAQModel.Question: How to Edit a Investment details?

Answers.string: In Investment Type page, click the Edit Investment button.
In Edit Investment page, input a required values that need to update.
Click the Save Button.
*System will check if the Branch Code is already exist.
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.

FAQModel.Question: How to Activate and Deactivate a Investment Type?

Answers.string: Select Investment Type to Activate or Deactivate by Ticking the Checkbox beside the Investment Code.
Click the Activate or Deactivate button above the Investment Type table.
Click the OK button.
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.

FAQModel.Question: How to add Access Group?

Answers.string: In Settings, click User Settings > Group Maintenance.
Group Maintenance page, click Add Group button (green plus icon on upper left corner of the page).
Input required values.
Click the Save button.
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.

FAQModel.Question: How to Activate or Deactivate Access Group?

Answers.string: Select Access to Activate or Deactivate by Ticking the Checkbox beside the Access Code.
Click the Activate or Deactivate button above the Access Group Table.
Click the OK button
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.

FAQModel.Question: How to Edit Access Group?

Answers.string: In Access Group Table, Click Edit button in Actions Column
In Edit Access Group Details page, edit the Access Group Values.
Click the Save button.
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.

FAQModel.Question: How to add Access Role?

Answers.string: In Settings > click User Settings > Access Maintenance.
Access Maintenance page, click Add Access button (green plus icon on upper left corner of the page).
Input required values.
Click the Save button.
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.

FAQModel.Question: How to Activate or Deactivate Access Role?

Answers.string: Select Access Role to Activate or Deactivate by ticking the checkbox beside the Access Code
Click Activate or Deactivate button above the Access Maintenance Table.
Click the OK button.
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.

FAQModel.Question: How to Edit Access Role?

Answers.string: In Access Role Table, click Edit button in Actions Column
In Edit Access Role page, Edit Access Role Values.
Click the Save button.
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.

FAQModel.Question: How to Add Access User?

Answers.string: In Settings, click User Settings > User Maintenance.
User Maintenance page, click Add User button (green plus icon on upper left corner of the page).
Input required values.
Click the Save button.
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.

FAQModel.Question: How to Activate or Deactivate Access User?

Answers.string: Select Access User to Activate or Deactivate by ticking the checkbox beside the User ID.
Click Activate or Deactivate button above the Access User Role table.
Click the OK button.
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.

FAQModel.Question: How to Edit Access User?

Answers.string: Click Edit button on Actions Column.
In Edit Access User page, Edit values.
Click the Save button.
NOTE: This page is accessible by ITG Access and Quality Management.
